name: Shopping Website
description: An e-commerce website where users can browse products, add them to a cart, and check out

name: Blogging Platform
description: A blogging website where users can create posts with a title, content, image, and tags. The homepage has a search bar for blog titles and content, and a tag list to filter blogs

name: Portfolio
description: A portfolio website with Home, About, Projects, and Contact sections. It supports English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese languages and has both dark and light themes
